metadata.title: CVE-2021-29948 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Signatures are written to disk before and read during verification, whichmight be subject to a race condition when a malicious local process or useris replacing the file. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
